mapper.select: SELECT c.exe_csqn AS "LabNo",-- 检验单号 c.his_item_name AS "LabName",-- 送检项目名称 b.sample_type AS "DemoCode",-- 样本编号 d.dict_name AS "DemoName",-- 样本名称 b.patient_id AS "Syh",-- 住院唯一编号 b.inhosno AS "BlCode",-- 住院病历号 '2' AS "LabType",-- 送检类别 1，细菌 2 其他 str_to_date( b.sample_reach_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T' ) AS "LabDate" -- 送检日期 FROM lis_test_reg b LEFT JOIN lis_dictionary_detail d ON d.type_code = 'LIS_SAMPLE_TYPE' AND d.dict_code = b.sample_type AND d.org_code = b.org_code LEFT JOIN lis_test_reg_his_item_detail c ON b.reg_id = c.reg_id AND b.org_code = b.org_code WHERE b.patient_type = 'I' AND b.org_code = #{map.Hoscode} AND b.get_sample_date >= str_to_date( #{map.beginDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %T' ) AND b.get_sample_date <= str_to_date( #{map.endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %T' )
